section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments by emergency legislation that will expire on February 22, 2026. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Enrollment in the CTF Program; denial.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 6 of Child Wealth Building Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-196, Oct. 1, 2021, 68 DCR 011607).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 6 of Child Wealth Building Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-239, Dec. 13, 2021, 68 DCR 013489).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(d) of Child Wealth Building Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-560, Oct. 17, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
For temporary (225 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(d) of Child Wealth Building Temporary Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24-224, Dec. 21, 2022, 69 DCR 13979).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 7012 of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-146, Sept. 3, 2025, 72 DCR 9623).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 7012 of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-210, Nov. 24, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
